title: Real Results for Real Businesses
description: My strategies don't just sound goodâ€”they deliver measurable outcomes that impact your bottom line. Here's what my clients have achieved.

caseStudies.title: SaaS Growth Acceleration
caseStudies.problem: B2B SaaS company struggled with high CAC and slow pipeline velocity despite solid product-market fit. Growth had plateaued after initial traction.
impacts: Reduced customer acquisition cost by 37% within 90 days
Increased conversion rate from MQL to SQL by 52%

caseStudies.title: B2B Lead Generation Strategy
caseStudies.problem: Professional services firm with inconsistent lead quality and excessive reliance on referrals. Marketing efforts were disconnected from sales outcomes.
impacts: Shortened sales cycle by 32% through better lead qualification

caseStudies.title: Market Expansion Strategy
caseStudies.problem: Tech company seeking expansion into new geographic markets without clear positioning or customer segmentation. Previous attempts had yielded poor ROI.
impacts: Achieved 124% of first-year revenue targets in new market
Established category leadership position in 9 months

caseStudies.title: Employer Branding Campaign
caseStudies.problem: Fast-growing company struggling with talent acquisition in competitive industry. High recruitment costs and extended time-to-fill for critical positions.
impacts: Increased qualified applicants by 87% for senior roles
